body.p:
Louisville June 26 -- 62
Gov Magoffin
Dear Sir
I here send you the petition of Edward Bond to remit a fine of sixty Dollars, which you will please do and send the remittance or respite as you may deem advisable, and

oblige truly yours
W R Jacob

P. S.
Please send to my address whatever you may think proper to do in the premises,
